articles.content: The government has also detailed the standard operating procedure for HICC that will be implemented immediately when an HCW tests positive for the virus. (Representational)Considering the possibility of healthcare workers (HCWs) contracting the novel coronavi… [+4118 chars]

articles.author: Mark O'Brien
articles.title: Can farts transmit coronavirus? One Australian doctor has some advice - Dublin Live
articles.description: Dr Norman Swan has advised 'no bare bottomed farts'
articles.content:
The nation remains in lockdown and observing social distancing guidelines in a bid to stop the spread of coronavirus.
The killer bug is spread through droplets  generated when an infected person coughs, sneezes, or speaks and so we have all been advised to c… [+1770 chars]
